pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:1.11: “Yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.10: suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.11: Vinaye okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.1.12: Abhidhamme okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.1: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.2: Anāpucchite vematikā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.2.3: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā pañhaṃ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc95:2.3.3: anodissa okāsaṃ kārāpetvā yattha katthaci pucchati,
